Class PagingScrollTable

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
com.google.gwt.user.client.EventListener, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.HasWidgets, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.IndexedPanel, ResizableWidget
public class PagingScrollTable
extends ScrollTable

A ScrollTable that acts as a view for an underlying TableModel.

CSS Style Rules

  • .gwt-ScrollTable .pagingOptions { paging options panel }
  • .gwt-ScrollTable .pagingOptions .errorLabel { error text in paging options }

getPageSize

public int getPageSize()
Returns:
the number of rows per page

setPageSize

public void setPageSize(int pageSize)
Set the number of rows per page. By default, the page size is zero, which indicates that all rows should be shown on the page.

Parameters:
pageSize - the number of rows per page

setPagingOptionsVisible

public void setPagingOptionsVisible(boolean visible)
Show or hide the paging options.

Parameters:
visible - true to show paging options, false to hide them
